message.sbutils.listSizeError: You may not add more than %s items to your %s.
message.sbutils.invalidListIndex: The index %s is not present in your %s.
message.sbutils.invCleaner.cleanFailed: Disabling %s because your inventory is full, and couldn't to be cleaned.
message.sbutils.autoAdvert.infoWithMinut: Sending advert %s in %s minutes and %s seconds.
message.sbutils.autoAdvert.reset: Reset Auto Advert timer and ad index.
message.sbutils.autoAdvert.noAds: Disabling Auto Advert because %s is empty or doesn't exist.
message.sbutils.autoAdvert.notWhiteliste: Whitelist is enabled but your username is not in the whitelist.
message.sbutils.autoAdvert.notOnSkyblock: You are not currently on Skyblock.
message.sbutils.joinCommands.accountComm: Join commands for the current account:
message.sbutils.joinCommands.invalidInde: A join command with that index does not exist.
message.sbutils.joinCommands.addSuccess: Join command successfully added. Current commands:
message.sbutils.joinCommands.deleteSucce: Join command successfully removed. Current commands:
message.sbutils.enchantAll.pleaseWait: Please wait until the current item is finished enchanting.
message.sbutils.enchantAll.cooldown: Enchant All cooldown initiated. Resuming in %s seconds.
message.sbutils.enchantAll.itemNotEnchan: You are not holding an enchantable item.
message.sbutils.enchantAll.noEnchantable: You don't have any enchantable items in your inventory.
message.sbutils.enchantAll.noEnchantAllP: You don't have access to the server-sided /enchantall command. If you are a SkyGod, set 'Enchant Mode' to 'Individual'.
message.sbutils.enchantAll.noEnchantPerm: You don't have access to the /enchant command.
message.sbutils.autoMine.noPickaxe: Disabling Auto Mine because you don't have any pickaxes to switch to, and Auto Fix isn't enabled.
message.sbutils.autoMine.timerNotSet: Auto Mine timer is not set.
message.sbutils.autoFix.infoWithMinutes: Fixing next item in %s minutes and %s seconds.
message.sbutils.autoFix.currentlyFixing: Auto Fix is currently fixing an item.
message.sbutils.autoFix.waiting: Auto Fix is waiting for an item with a low enough durability.
message.sbutils.autoFix.maxTriesReached: Fix command sent %s times with no response. Disabling Auto Fix.
message.sbutils.toolSaver.actionBlocked: Action blocked due to item durability being too low.
message.sbutils.autoCommand.delaySetSucc: Delay for command %s has been updated from %s to %s.
message.sbutils.autoRaffle.notEnoughGras: You don't have enough grass to purchase raffle tickets.
message.sbutils.autoSilk.invFull: Disabling Auto Silk because your inventory is full.
message.sbutils.autoSilk.noLapis: Disabling Auto Silk because you don't have any lapis in your inventory.
message.sbutils.autoSilk.notEnoughLapis: Disabling Auto Silk because you don't have enough lapis in your inventory.
message.sbutils.autoSilk.noTools: Disabling Auto Silk because you don't have any %s in your inventory.
message.sbutils.autoSilk.noBooks: Disabling Auto Silk because you don't have any books in your inventory.
message.sbutils.autoSilk.notEnoughExperi: Disabling Auto Silk because you don't have enough experience levels.
message.sbutils.autoSilk.notCloseEnough: Disabling Auto Silk because you aren't close enough to an enchanting table.
message.sbutils.autoCrate.crateTooFar: Disabling Auto Crate because the crate is not within reach.
message.sbutils.autoCrate.inventoryFull: Disabling Auto Crate because your inventory is full.
message.sbutils.autoCrate.closeGui: Disabling Auto Crate because you closed the crate gui.
message.sbutils.autoKit.invFull: Your inventory doesn't have enough space for kit %s. Waiting...
message.sbutils.staffDetector.noStaff: There are no longer any staff online.
message.sbutils.centered.suitable: This island will be suitable for map art creation with a %s expansion.
message.sbutils.centered.extraSpace: You will have %s extra blocks to the north, %s to the south, %s to the east, and %s to the west.
message.sbutils.centered.notSuitable: This island is not suitable for map art creation.
message.sbutils.deathCoords.deathCoords: Your last death was in the dimension %s at [%s, %s, %s].
text.sbutils.config.title: sbutils Options
text.sbutils.config.option.messagePrefix: The prefix that appears before sbutils messages. The '%s' will be replaced with 'sbutils'.
The color of the sbutils name in messages.
text.sbutils.config.option.prefixColor.t: The color of the characters surrounding 'sbutils' in the message prefix.
text.sbutils.config.option.valueColor.to: The color of values in sbutils messages.
text.sbutils.config.option.antiPlace.hea: Prevents the placement of heads that have custom names.
text.sbutils.config.option.antiPlace.gra: Prevents the placement of grass blocks.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoAdvert.en: Automatically sends messages from a file.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoAdvert.sb: The txt file containing your /skyblock advertisements.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoAdvert.ec: The txt file containing your /economy advertisements.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoAdvert.cl: The txt file containing your /classic advertisements.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoAdvert.in: The delay between joining and sending an advert. (Seconds)
text.sbutils.config.option.autoAdvert.us: Only sends adverts from the account(s) specified in the whitelist.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoAdvert.wh: A list of accounts that may send adverts if 'Use Advert Whitelist' is enabled.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoCommand.e: Repeatedly executes a command with a set delay.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoCommand.m: The minimum delay between commands if there are multiple in the list.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoCrate.mod: The type of crate to target.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoCrate.cle: Cleans your inventory if it becomes full.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoCrate.ite: A list of items to clean from your inventory.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoCrate.del: After the current crate finishes, how long to wait before opening the next.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoCrate.dis: The maximum distance from the crate.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoFix.enabl: Automatically fixes the most damaged items in your inventory over time.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoFix.perce: The maximum durability percentage an item can have and be fixed.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoFix.retry: How long to wait for a response before sending the fix command again.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoFix.maxRe: The maximum amount of times to retry the fix command if the server isn't responding.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoKit.comma: If multiple kits are to be claimed at the same time, the delay between each command.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoKit.claim: The amount of additional delay after the predicted kit reset time, to account for inaccuracies. Only applies to non 24-hour kits.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoKit.syste: Delay used to account for system time desync when claiming 24-hour kits. Changing this is not recommended.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoMine.auto: Automatically switches to a new pickaxe when the current durability gets too low.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoMine.swit: The durability to switch to a new pickaxe at.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoPrivate.n: Up to two names to put on private signs. Yours is included automatically.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoRaffle.en: Automatically buys raffle tickets when you log in and when the raffle ends.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoRaffle.sb: The amount of raffle tickets to purchase on /skyblock. (Max. 2)
text.sbutils.config.option.autoRaffle.ec: The amount of raffle tickets to purchase on /economy. (Max. 5)
text.sbutils.config.option.autoReply.res: The response to send to private messages.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoReply.del: The delay between responses if multiple people message you at once. (Seconds)
text.sbutils.config.option.autoSilk.enab: Automatically enchants books and diamond pickaxes with Silk Touch.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoSilk.targ: The tool that Auto Silk will target.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoSilk.clea: Cleans books without Silk Touch from your inventory when it becomes full.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoSilk.dela: The delay between each enchanting action.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoSilk.show: Adds a button to the enchantment screen for toggling Auto Silk.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoSilk.butt: The position of the Auto Silk button.
text.sbutils.config.option.chatAppend.ad: Adds the specified prefix to all the messages you send.
text.sbutils.config.option.chatAppend.pr: The prefix to add to your messages.
text.sbutils.config.option.chatAppend.ad: Adds the specified suffix to all the messages you send.
text.sbutils.config.option.chatAppend.su: The suffix to add to your messages.
text.sbutils.config.option.chatFilters.t: Whether tip messages should be filtered from chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.chatFilters.a: Whether advancement messages should be filtered from chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.chatFilters.w: Whether player welcome messages should be filtered from chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.chatFilters.f: Whether friend join messages should be filtered from chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.chatFilters.m: Whether island MOTD messages should be filtered from chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.chatFilters.v: Whether player vote messages should be filtered from chat.
Whether player vote reward messages should be filtered from chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.chatFilters.r: Whether raffle messages should be filtered from chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.chatFilters.c: Whether crate opening messages should be filtered from chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.chatFilters.p: Whether 'perished in void' messages should be filtered from chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.chatFilters.s: Whether SkyChat messages should be filtered from chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.chatLogger.sh: Whether to log transaction messages from your shops.
Whether to log transaction messages from other players' shops.
text.sbutils.config.option.chatLogger.ms: Whether to log incoming private messages.
Whether to log outgoing private messages.
text.sbutils.config.option.chatLogger.vi: Whether to log players visiting your island.
text.sbutils.config.option.chatLogger.dp: Whether to log messages from drop party events.
text.sbutils.config.option.enchantAll.mo: Whether to use the built in /enchantall command, or send enchants individually.
text.sbutils.config.option.enchantAll.de: The delay between sending enchant commands. (Seconds)
text.sbutils.config.option.enchantAll.co: The number of commands to be executed before a cooldown is initiated. (To avoid spam kick)
text.sbutils.config.option.eventNotifier: Shows a title when a vote party llama appears at spawn.
Plays a sound when a vote party llama appears at spawn.
The sound played when a vote party llama appears at spawn.
Shows a title when a wandering trader appears at spawn.
Plays a sound when a wandering trader appears at spawn.
The sound played when a wandering trader appears at spawn.
The delay between joining the server and sending the commands.
text.sbutils.config.option.mentions.enab: Detects mentions of words/phrases in chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.mentions.play: Notifies you with a sound when something is mentioned in chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.mentions.soun: The sound played when something is mentioned in chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.mentions.high: Whether to change the color of mentions in chat.
The color to highlight mentions with.
text.sbutils.config.option.mentions.excl: Doesn't notify you about server messages.
Doesn't notify you about your own messages.
Ignores the sender (the prefix/name of the player) when checking for mentions.
text.sbutils.config.option.mentions.curr: Notifies you when your username is mentioned in chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.mentions.alia: A list of strings you would like to be notified for.
text.sbutils.config.option.noGmt.enabled: Replaces GMT date/time in /mail and /email with a preferred timezone.
text.sbutils.config.option.noGmt.timeZon: Set a preferred time zone, or leave blank to use system time.
text.sbutils.config.option.noGmt.showTim: Displays the new time zone in parenthesis next to the date/time.
text.sbutils.config.option.staffDetector: Whether you should receive notifications when staff members join.
Whether you should receive notifications when staff members leave.
Whether to play sounds when staff members join/leave.
The sound played when staff join/leave.
text.sbutils.config.option.toolSaver.ena: Prevents usage of tools after a certain durability.
